title: Recruiter Hays half-year profit surges on hiring demand; finance director to retire - Reuters
content: Recruiter Hays half-year profit surges on hiring demand; finance director to retire  Reuters
description: Hays Plc's half-year profit more than quadrupled, helped by a rebound in new hiring in Germany and the UK, with higher demand from technology and Life Sciences sectors, the British recruitment agency said on Thursday.
